p: Influenza vaccination rates increased with age from as low as 1.1% in patients aged < 1 year to as high as 49.0% in patients aged ≥85 years, whereas no clear trend was observed for antiviral use (Additional file 4). As expected, chronic conditions increased with age (from 2.9% in patients < 1 year to 89.2% in patients ≥80 years).
